website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for lighting your walkway from the driveway to the front door or tables at a party or wedding. Equally beautiful for adding a subtle glow to a rustic deck area.
pros: Set of eight lanterns is enough to decorate a medium-size deck or pathway
Can be mounted a variety of ways
You can hang, clamp, or stake these solar lights
Two power-on options: auto-on at sunset or simple on and off
Lanterns are waterproof and include a rechargeable battery
cons: Customers report that the lanterns seem to dim over time

customer_reviews.title: Well lit in dark backyard
customer_reviews.text: These are cool little lights and quite a bit different from the ones I've seen in hardware stores. They're easy to assemble. Just lift the cover, remove the thin protective tab, turn the small switch to ON and close the lid. **For best results, lights should be in direct sunlight a full 8 hours. Great thing about these is that they have two features: as hanging lanterns (with a side clip) and as pathway lights. My backyard is very dark. So for starters, I placed them 5ft apart just to see how much light they give off... perfect :) I'm very happy with these little guys and I will purchase some more for the front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Steven T Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Hmmm
customer_reviews.text: They come out of the box REALLY bright. Then they dim down. I have purchased two boxes. Out of two boxes, one light didn't work at all so returned the whole box for a replacement. I'm not trying to light my yard with these but it is curious that they get increasingly dimmer with age even though they're charging in the same sunlight. The difference in age of the two lights shown is three weeks.
customer_reviews.author: done

customer_reviews.title: Not very good.
customer_reviews.text: They look great, but one by one they are stopping working 4 down so far, not the batteries. Revision of review, It's November and only 2 are still working, These look great, but are 1 year disposable, I put in new batteries, still not working.
customer_reviews.author: Papajoe

customer_reviews.title: Bright but souless
customer_reviews.text: One of the brightest LED solar lanterns i've seen. But the light comes from top of the enclosure, and not from the faux candle. It doesn't even attempt to make it look like it is candle lit. What you have is a brightly lit box (see pictures) that is bright white than warm white. Expensive for what it is. Very disappointing and returning.
customer_reviews.author: travelbuddy

customer_reviews.title: Unique lawn lights.
customer_reviews.text: These just mighty be my favourite purchase for anything yard related. I am using them to illuminate my front yard walkway to the porch. I really enjoy the candle lantern style, it's uniquely different from the other awn lights that you normally see. The lights are a perfect brightness. Overall im happy.
customer_reviews.author: Julie T

customer_reviews.title: Nice lanterns for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The first stake I tried to put in the ground snapped off immediately so I’d suggest making sure the ground is really soft or pre “drilling” your holes. I hung them after the stake broke. Other than that, they seem to have lasted well the last couple months. They could be brighter but I didn’t expect much. They give a nice ambient glow. I wish you didn’t have to take the lid off to flip the switch on and off. A remote would have been nice. They hold their solar charge well, though.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Bear

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I have bought sets of these lights in the past. First I bought the regular lights and those were pretty, then I decided to buy the LED version of these and they were also alright and lastly I came across this type and I absolutely love everything about it as it works just as it should and the shades that it gives on the ground at night it is absolutely amazing. The battery pretty much holds all night and I do not have a single bad comment about this product. I will be getting more to have it all around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Guilherme Maciel

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of light!
customer_reviews.text: We received these lights in March, but I waited a while so that I could see if the brightness of the lights lasts. It does! As long as you clean the tops periodically so that the solar batteries get the full benefit of the sun, you will have the same amount of light each night. They charge quickly and give light until the wee hours of the morning. We have them hanging on shepherd's hooks between plants. A perfect touch at a price much less than others I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: First impression, I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Just received on Sunday (today is Monday). The lights are very easy to use-just turn the on, remove the battery protecting strip and let the light charge them. In no time they were charged enough to light up! They are small, but put out a lot of light for their size. Since I just received them I can’t speak to how they stand up to time and weather. But first impression, I’m impressed!
customer_reviews.author: L Hock

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I love these little guys! They light up my patio perfectly! I was skeptical about how well they would work, but even the first night they lit up at dusk after only a few hours of fading sunlight. Even the lanterns placed under the eve of the roof charge and stay lit all night. I have been up until 3 am and they were still going strong. I highly recommend them to anyone wanting to create a romantic vibe!
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: A nice big light for such a little lantern
customer_reviews.text: As described. Easy to put together and even with only a few hours to charge before it became dark. these worked and lit so well on our yard. I was so impressed that I ordered another 8. The only thing that was a bit disappointing was I thought they would be a little bigger. Not a deal breaker but just in case you are looking for bigger lanterns, these aren't it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile solar lights
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for.Great way to light up your walkway and or use around a camper or in landscaping. I love that you can hang them or use the stakes ( that come with them ) . Excellent product to even give as a gift, for new homeowners or as a Christmas gift for people with campers or your friends that host parties and even People who love to landscape/ gardeners, Happy with this purchase .
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Atkin

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected, but still very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice solar lights! They match the craftsman look that I am going for. I was surprised that they were plastic, but I just assumed they were metal so that’s on me. They still look great & appear to be durable. I also thought the wick of the candle would light up, but it does not & they do not flicker. One of them arrived without a wick at all! They are very cool & different than the normal solar light. I plan on purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful outdoor lanterns
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most beautiful outdoor lights I have installed in my garden! I bought these to decorate a small palm tree and they're a really nice set of lanterns. They're small, about the size of my palm but they glow very brightly at night. The solar panels at the top blend in with the lantern exterior and I like that I am able to use lights like this which do not require electrical wiring or batteries. They turn on once it goes dark and last for hours. One of my favorite features is the handle which allows me to hang the lanterns on the branches. I highly recommend these lights.
customer_reviews.author: Sabera

customer_reviews.title: Nice look, great price & quality
customer_reviews.text: Had these 3 months now and working nice. Subtle lighting giving my backyard a nice ambiance without being too bright. Here’s a day photo and again these are more of a mood lighting, nothing bright if that’s what you desire. I have them along my fence and on each end of my hammock. Everyone has complimented.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Young

customer_reviews.title: Not a lot of light.
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to spruce up my patio (Staying at Home due to COVID) and so I've bought several different solar lighting products and lanterns, etc. These things are WAY smaller than I realized, which is my bad, but they also don't shed much light at all. Also, the light that is visible is white rather than yellow. Just not my cup of tea. I prefer this product, which I also bought: GIGALUMI Hanging Solar Mason Jar Lid Lights, 6 Pack 15 Led String Fairy Lights Solar Laterns Table Lights, 6 Hangers and Jars Included. Great Outdoor Lawn Décor for Patio Garden, Yard and Lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: seems nice but cames on way after the dark and not all at the same time first few days
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 sets of 8 solar lamps and after two days only 3 came on at the same time and a couple of hours late on the rest came on even though all of them get the same amount of sunlight which was concerning. such delay lasted for couple of days -each day but now few weeks later they all are coming on at the same time and they are gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: No problems ever!
customer_reviews.text: I lined my backyard in these and it looks so much better! Water doesn't get in, they're plenty bright, steaks are super long and don't come out of the ground, they've stayed in tact for a year now and work like how they did brand new. Assembly took 15 minutes for all of them or less. We have rain, wind, snow, and extreme heat where I live and nothing has affected them.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Herman

customer_reviews.title: Attractive lights for outdoor decoration
customer_reviews.text: These lights came in an 8 pack which is a great starter set if you have just a few places that you would like them. I found it easy to "activate" the lights for soaking up sunlight, after that they just come on automatically. I plan to hand them on my deck and porch for soft nighttime lighting. They seem sturdy enough to last 3-4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Angie F.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome decorative lights along fountain, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought 8 pack solar lanterns during 2019 Christmas and put them all around my water fountain pool. Those lights look really cool and enhance beauty of my fountain in the night. The light stays bright more than 6 -8 hours. On these lights battery can be easily changed or cleaned unlike some other solar lights where batteries are built in. some of the lamps fell into the pool and the battery terminals got moist and rusted as such they stop working. I called the Gigalumi, they offer to relace the lights immediately even after six months of use. I'm very satisfied with lights and Gialumi professional customer service and recommend strongly to buy these lights. Ravindra S.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjit Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great lights, but recent 50% price increase.
customer_reviews.text: We love these lanterns hanging in our backyard trees. We wanted to try one box before we bought more. We love the fun accent lighting it provides. They were easy to set up, they have lasted so far and the light is nice. They have been great and we want to order more. We noticed that the price has increased by 50% since April. I guess we will find another product or wait for the price to be adjusted appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Liked but don't appear to last.
customer_reviews.text: Love that these are easy to use and versatile in that you can easily take the lantern off the post. Did break one spike right after getting. Ground must of been too hard. What I am disappoint in is that they apparently leak. Looks like water got into solar panels and that appears to have reduced solar power significantly - only 3 months in.
customer_reviews.author: Ceeagee

customer_reviews.title: Bright and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: They are so easy and bright! I put them on short Shepard's hooks and they are so adorable. I loved the forst set i reordered a 2nd and will be ordering more in the future. They are definitely light enough to light a pathway. The ones I have are in direct sunlight for 8hrs a day and they are still on at dawn.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: We love these little lights. They’re bright enough and since they’re solar, very easy to install and set up in the yard, no wires and electricity needed. They’re very cute and stylish. I also light that there is a clip on the hangar so it can also be hung up if you don’t want to use them on the lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Paul & Cindi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but light weight
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and have a great look but most of it is plastic. They are so lightweight that I had to change the position of a couple of them next to my pool because my sprinklers keeps blasting them off the shepherds hooks I hung them on. They aren't super bright either but it's enough light for ambience. Overall, I like them but I wonder if they will last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Kozuch

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't quite sure what to expect considering the quantity, and price. Thus far, the solar on all of the lanterns is working great. I have found that even on overcast days, the lanterns are powered just as well as they are on sunny days. Over all really happy with the product. They are very simple to setup, are lightweight, much brighter than I anticipated, and look great. I decided to hang my lanterns, apposed to using the posts that are included. If you do decide to hang the lanterns, be sure they are hung securely to ensure that they will not blow away (as I mentioned they are very lightweight).
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: C
customer_reviews.text: Update: a week in and 6 of the 8 have condensation inside. Will reach out to seller. Great little light. As some said, it doesn't have the yellower light that I'd prefer but they look cool and stay on all night.
customer_reviews.author: Wagz

customer_reviews.title: Create nice atmosphere
customer_reviews.text: These lights are great for creating a nice atmosphere. They are a little smaller than I was envisioning and the light they give off is really more about ambiance than function. The stakes they come with are also shorter than I was thinking they would be. But, the lights work great and offer a nice accent around our fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J

customer_reviews.title: Good decorative patio lights
customer_reviews.text: Nice lights. They are slightly smaller than I anticipated. But that is my fault for not fully reading the product description. Work well and look nice hanging from small shepherds hooks along my patio
customer_reviews.author: Buyer1

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights that can be hung or staked in the ground
customer_reviews.text: We love these lights! They can be put in the ground on the posts or hung up. They are just bright enough for our walkway, plus there are 8 so you can spread them out. I’m going to order more for our back deck to hang. The fact that they’re solar makes it so much easier then wiring lights back there
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Thomsen

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected, but they look good.  Surprisingly bright for their size
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but they look good. Surprisingly bright for their size. Have not had them long enough to comment on how they handle inclement weather, so that is for another time. So far, we like them. Oh, and when you turn them on, lift up on the top to open, not twist like the directions say. make sure to charge fully before first use, and they will last until daylight!
customer_reviews.author: Terry J Yelvington

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy them
customer_reviews.text: They were the worst. I brought them for my outside and the lights were so dim it was just like you having nothing out. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: JERRY FLEET

customer_reviews.title: Been outside for wks- running strong
customer_reviews.text: Been outside for wks- running strong, best value that I could find that had a nice traditional look. We live in bermuda..so with high humidity and heat they've dobne extremely well. I actually use them at the beach for bonfires and used them without the stakes on top of dinning tables as centrepieces for a bday party!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Gutteridge

customer_reviews.title: Path lights
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute in my yard. My house has a rustic theme and these are perfect to bring that feeling outdoors. They come in at dusk and make it until the wee hours if the morning! Great lights.
customer_reviews.author: Christin S

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I needed some lanterns for my garden and got a set of 8, which is just perfect for the space. Even though the light doesn't come from the "candle," itself, it certainly looks like it when they are on. They could be slightly brighter, but they are very attractive and serve their purpose. I would recommend them highly!
customer_reviews.author: Operaman27

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! I had other lanterns that stopped lighting up after a few days. These have stayed lit up for a couple months now. They are a great value for the price. I am sooooo happy! I would definitely buy them again!
customer_reviews.author: OCmom

customer_reviews.title: Lasted only a couple of months.
customer_reviews.text: They worked great last summer when I first received them. When I pulled them out of storage for this summer, only 2 of the 8 lanterns worked. I tried replacing the batteries and letting them charge for a few days in the sun, but they were dead. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: LVHSB

customer_reviews.title: Not a warm white
customer_reviews.text: The web description that these are a WARM white is not accurate. The LED light is a harsh bright white. I know that an amber LED is possible because I have a number of flame-like amber tiki lights in my yard. These clash and are not as pretty to look at. Returning them.
customer_reviews.author: RBROWN

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheap quality but work good!
customer_reviews.text: I paid $54.99 in April. I wouldn’t pay more than that for these they look cheap but serve their purpose great! Not extremely bright and smaller than expected. I’d buy again if they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: M. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: These lights are so neat and versatile. They aren't super bright, but provide enough light and a little bit of a calming effect around our landscaping. I had an issue with one of the lights upon opening. The pull tab was removed and even after putting a new battery in the light it wouldn't work properly. Customer service was excellent to deal with and promptly refunded the amount for that light. I'll purchase more of these lights soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, but tiny
customer_reviews.text: Light u great and simple to use as lantern or place stake in for ground. I should have thought through size......for they are really small....like a tiny, toy version. But, illuminate very well and I will use them elsewhere than what planned.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite items for my patio, garden, even for my dinner table! I usually have the lanterns in the direct sun during the day so they are always charged.
customer_reviews.author: Haydee B

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but not bright
customer_reviews.text: These look beautiful hanging from brackets around my garden. They really kick up the ambiance. Just don’t expect them to illuminate the space very much.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: They look nice, easy to put in ground, unfortunately they don't all work so it kind of ruins the look. Since I threw out the boxes, I'm stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Irene G. Reale

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lights!
customer_reviews.text: These are honestly great, just bought a bunch of new outdoor lights for our new house, these are probably my favorite! They look like real luminaries!
customer_reviews.author: Jamison Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: These are really pretty and perfect size for my walkway. I like the versatility of being able to use them in different ways. They charge easily, start turning on at dusk and last until sunrise.
customer_reviews.author: SCD

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I bought these lights. They are just bright enough around our pool adding ambiance light without blinding us.
customer_reviews.author: Debi N

customer_reviews.title: Overall as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Plastic but fairly nice looking. One of the 8 was defective. Would be nice if they were metal, but I knew they were not when I ordered. Would give better score if one of the lights was not broken out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Bright little lights
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright light! They’re a little smaller than I thought they would be, but they work great. We have them outlining our very dark driveway. I’m going to buy more for the back yard
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and cozy little lanterns.
customer_reviews.text: These little lights are really nice. I was hoping for a little brighter of a light, but they make for a nice warm, cozy feel for my backyard gazebo. Overall I am pleased so far. We'll see how long the last.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie R.

customer_reviews.title: Candle like solar lanterns set of 8
customer_reviews.text: These solar lantern lights looks Amazing on my porch. They give off ALOT of light and truly look like flickering candles. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Connie L Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns are a bright, warm white (I can't stand the blueish tone that many "white" solar lights have). I have them hanging on my back deck between my solar lanterns and they look perfect! So far so good-- it's only been a few days, but they give my back porch just the ambiance I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Cree629

customer_reviews.title: Nice lighting
customer_reviews.text: The lights are nice and bright but soft the light the path way and are easy to love and change the batter if needed they cane charged up some of the batteries weren’t charged they say they are rechargeable haven’t tried it yet but good quality for the price definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Gill

customer_reviews.title: Cute - But smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: These are very cute and quite bright for their size. They are really small and lightweight. They are a little pricey at almost $5.50 apiece. They have only been in the yard for a week, so I will try to remember to repost how they hold up after a month or so or rain and sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great for being cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic, but great value. They work as well as my "quality" solar lanterns. If you are looking to light up an area and not pay too much, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Nice solar lamps
customer_reviews.text: These lamps are really good brightness is decent enough. I hanged few in my lawn treen and few in my porch it looks really awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre, but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Do not offer any real illumination, more for aesthetic purposes. About half of them didn't turn on the following night of being hung out on fence posts.
customer_reviews.author: Fortyeightportsmouth

customer_reviews.title: Love them so far!!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few days to put out because the weather in Florida has been horrible. So far I love these!! They are super bright and last for hours. Not sure how long exactly but I am happy with them. They are much brighter than my old ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I used these lights to replace ones that had died several years ago. They illuminate my sidewalk in the back yard. i had no issues setting them up as I was able to use the metal holders from my old lights. They worked perfectly from the very first night on. I thought they might look cheapy based on some of the reviews, but they don't at all. They were exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jane A. Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Charming, bright and simple
customer_reviews.text: Adorable! Bright, too! Very charming. I hang a few at the opening of my gate to the driveway. I will be purchasing more. I keep finding places to use them! Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Ocr22

customer_reviews.title: Great Accent Lights!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrives within a day via Amazon Prime. Easy to assemble. No need for instructions. These lights adds a great ambience in my yard.
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD TAN

customer_reviews.title: They are great Lanterns
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about these is they don't flicker like my old ones.
customer_reviews.author: D. Avaro

customer_reviews.title: Great little lanterns
customer_reviews.text: I use them for my wood bear carvings. fast shipping, well packed, easy to use. not sure about the longevity yet
customer_reviews.author: jaramia bond

customer_reviews.title: These do not work
customer_reviews.text: This was a terrible purchase for me . They never worked . I e moved them tomecand time again . They cane in one time . Unfortunately I waited too long to return Don’t buy them
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but don’t last
customer_reviews.text: Cute, but they don’t last long. You have to replace them every 3-6 months, so for the price they are not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: BDH

customer_reviews.title: Quality is hit and miss.
customer_reviews.text: When they work, they are really cute. The problem is they only work when they want to and the same 4 keep going out or they are really dim. If it rains, the condensation builds up on the inside. They are in full sun.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute looking little lanterns and shed a decent amount of light considering their size. Easy enough to assemble and place and they last quite a while
customer_reviews.author: Vyxen

customer_reviews.title: Lights that can give a patio a nice ambiance
customer_reviews.text: These solar lights brighten my tree line path nicely with a soft glow. They were easy to set up and were lit throughout the first night of use.
customer_reviews.author: Yunicka

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition
customer_reviews.text: This has been a welcomed addition to the lighting scheme of my backyard. It is a very nice accent piece, but I would not use as a primary lighting source for landscape or paths. If you are looking for something classic which helps set the tone, I would highly recommend these lanterns.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoors events
customer_reviews.text: These Solar Lanterns are great solar hanging lanterns to put outdoors for beautiful looks and light .soft light at night. i even use them at my night time farmers market outdoors for lighting and bring people in . These lanterns come in the classic style of a candle lantern, but they provide safe, LED light from solar power. No worries about fire hazard from unattended or knocked-over lights, i like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: lilmattie

customer_reviews.title: I like that I can use these as minature lanterns.
customer_reviews.text: These little lights can be put in the ground or they can be hung. I put them on outdoor shelving and they make a nice decoration on my patio. They appear as tiny lanterns and have a nice effect. You can also hang them as they have have handles with fasteners. I like the versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Switzer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, adds charm to my front yard !
customer_reviews.text: Neat design and easy to operate and assemble.i would love to have a more powerful light than what it has but it works perfectly in dark.
customer_reviews.author: A*D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t stay lit for long.
customer_reviews.text: They didn’t last very long. I expected them to last a longer than a month and half. I got some other ones for my backyard and they are still going. Probably wouldn’t buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these lanterns
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lanterns before and loved how they flickered like actual candles.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle U

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights
customer_reviews.text: I bought these lanterns for my front patio. They are great! I would love to place a second order to put some on my back patio but the price has gone up by twenty five dollars. I need to wait for the price to drop, if it ever does.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn McCausey

customer_reviews.title: Review by Jessica T Conner
customer_reviews.text: Sort of confused when I first opened it, thinking it was harder than it was! After the first one, was a breeze to assemble! Just pop top lid off and turn on switch. The light is underneath/part of lid not the candle. As you can see, it’s exactly as described and works like it says.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica tallent

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my front yard!
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and easy to set up. They look very nice lining my front walkway. I’ve only had them a few days, so I can’t speak to how well they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Eski

customer_reviews.title: Wish they were brighter
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, work well for the area. Not as bright as they are portrayed in the sellers pictures though.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Little

customer_reviews.title: It works really great!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly can’t be more happy with it - I woke up at 5am today, still dark outside and those lights still worked, shining bright and beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: let there be light
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my friends fence. Puts a great highlight on the newly planted backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Y.

customer_reviews.title: Best solar-powered lights
customer_reviews.text: I've bought lights before that came apart with the change of seasons, just on their own. These ones are great quality, heavy duty, and look so great on our front lawn at night. I highly recommend! Totally worth what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Alessia

customer_reviews.title: love how they light up
customer_reviews.text: Its enough light to light up my whole patio and the best part is you don't have to turn them on/off, they just turn on when its dark. also very convenient that they have clips and stakes so you can decide how and where to place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Very bright and just perfect if installed in patio,love this lantern
customer_reviews.author: salim agus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love them wish they were bigger but I knew what size when I bought them I’ll order more soon
customer_reviews.author: Happy jeep girl

customer_reviews.title: Bright white light and will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights. In the past all the lights I ever bought were a pale yellow but these are a bright white light and look beautiful Around My gazebo
customer_reviews.author: Susan M.

customer_reviews.title: Bright! Look like I paid more for them.
customer_reviews.text: These lanterns are AWESOME! I hung them in our weeping crabapple tree as halloween decor and they really look fantastic. Looking forward to seeing how they handle cooler temps as it says they can be used in all seasons. Darkest photo was taken through the window of our house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty light
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty lights on my kitchen island outside they last a long time around 8 o’clock and lasted till five in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Borowski

customer_reviews.title: Added beauty at a affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: I displayed these lanterns on each side of my house windows. Gives my home a serene alluminating feel. They are smaller than I imagined. However they are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Occhipinti

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Bright!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for attractive, bright, low-maintenance lighting for my deck. These lights fit the bill!! They are quite bright for their small size. There are a lot of them— so we could put some on our table and some hanging from our deck railing. They look beautiful. Very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Pia Baker

customer_reviews.title: So pretty! I love them
customer_reviews.text: I received these a few days ago I love them! I wish I ordered another pack because now they are unavailable 🙈 bring them back please. When they become available put have them
customer_reviews.author: carrie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lights!
customer_reviews.text: These lights are beautiful. I love that you can put them on the stake or hang them up. Great quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Royals

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful in my yard
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 sets. They look great in my yard. Happy with the brightness. I’ve gotten many compliments and have recommended to friends. They work great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Turgeon

customer_reviews.title: Safe and beautiful .
customer_reviews.text: My whole porch got a face lift. Safe to walk on in winter now because of the light.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and practical!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty hanging on my shade sail posts! I installed pretty brackets about 5-1/2' high and the lanterns can sway in the breeze. The light is the soft yellow white which gives the area a warm, cozy, romantic feel.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Walton

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: These lights are incredibly cheaply made. They don't last past about two hours after they go on. Even after a full day of sun for the solar panel on the top. Very disappointing product.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Not good for apartments
customer_reviews.text: They don’t really charge. I have them placed on my balcony and because they don’t get direct sunlight they don’t necessarily charge, so when the sun goes down they only last like an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 more lights out, total of 3.  Just bought in March!
customer_reviews.text: 1st order, received broken lights. Replacement order, 1 light out after a month. 2 more lights out a few months later. Its unfortunate, they are nice looking and look good when they are actually working.
customer_reviews.author: JLA

customer_reviews.title: On smaller size but mighty.
customer_reviews.text: Love these lights, but wish they came in a larger size , as I have 3 large Sheppard hook's and they would look great on them.
customer_reviews.author: cindy

customer_reviews.title: Dim lights
customer_reviews.text: Cute lights but that's really what it is. Don't recommend for function but more for decor.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica M.

customer_reviews.title: They provide more of a glow than light.
customer_reviews.text: They appear well made and look nice. However, they don’t really provide light but more of a glow so if you are planning to use them to light up a walkway at night, I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ray

product_meta.title: GIGALUMI 8 Pack Solar Hanging Lantern Outdoor, Candle Effect Light with Stake for Garden,Patio, Lawn, Deck, Umbrella, Tent, Tree,Yard,Driveway-Warm White
feature_bullets: Soft Candle Effect - Decorative outdoor solar lantern replicates the effect of a candle lamp for mood lighting in your home, garden, patio or balcony.
Portable & Sturdy - Solar power LED lantern with a metal clamp,hook and stake, easy to hang or insert the lantern lights to anywhere you want.

Widely Used - Every outdoor lantern light is coming with an extral stake,can insert it into patio,garden & lawn.The cute clamp is very durable and powerful. Decorative lanterns can hung on umbrella, tent, tree and elsewhere, decorate your environment when you are partying, camping, fishing and so on.
Assembles Easily - Installs in no time and no tools or wiring required. Auto-on at dusk with optional ON/OFF switch
Waterproof and Warranty - Designed to withstand sunny days, rainy nights, and small snowy days. These outdoor decorative lights provide 90 Days replacement OR risk-free refund warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars627 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
